Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

So I started playing Real Solar System yesterday and I quickly discovered the stock parts weren't powerful enough to launch anything that weighs more than a few tonnes to LEO.

That's why I would like to hear some suggestions for mods I should use.

By the way I'm playing version 1.2.1.

 

Thank you.

You need to install either SMURF or ROMini to play with RSS-non-RO. SMURF modifies the mass fractions of the propellant tanks while ROMini also rescales the parts to have a proper aerodynamic behavior.
